name: Correlations matrix
description: Creates a matrix of correlations between the numeric and categorical fields in a dataset. The index used by default to measure correlation is **eta squared** (one-way ANOVA) and

inputs.name: fields
inputs.description: List of fields selected. All by default

inputs.name: options
inputs.description: Additional arguments to be used in correlations creation

outputs.name: correlations-tab
outputs.description: Matrix with correlations values as needed for correlograms
